resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104311</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104311</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770204452</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The drought causes conservation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Dürre verursacht Erhaltung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La sécheresse cause l'économie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A seca causa o conservation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La siccità causa la conservazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η ξηρασία προκαλεί τη συντήρηση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La sequía causa la conservación</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The students will use their knowledge of the importance of water to learn about the hydrosphere. The drought being experienced will be explored through graphs and a personal plan for water conservation.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Kursteilnehmer verwenden ihr Wissen des Wertes
des Wassers, um über den Hydrosphere zu erlernen. Die Dürre, 
die erfahren ist, wird durch Diagramme und einen persönlichen Plan 
für Wassererhaltung erforscht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants emploieront leur connaissance 
d'importance de l'eau pour se renseigner sur l'hydrosphère. La 
sécheresse étant expérimentée sera explorée par des graphiques et
un plan personnel pour l'économie de l'eau.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes usarão seu conhecimento da 
importância da água aprender sobre o hydrosphere. A seca que 
é experiente será explorada com os gráficos e uma planta pessoal 
para o conservation da água.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi useranno la loro conoscenza 
dell'importanza di acqua per imparare circa il hydrosphere. La 
siccità che è con esperienza sarà esplorata con i grafici e un 
programma personale per conservazione dell'acqua.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα χρησιμοποιήσουν τη γνώση τους 
σπουδαιότητας του ύδατος για να μάθουν για την υδρόσφαιρα. Η
ξηρασία που είναι πεπειραμένη θα εξερευνηθεί μέσω των γραφικών 
παραστάσεων και ενός προσωπικού σχεδίου για τη συντήρηση ύδατος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes utilizarán su conocimiento de la 
importancia del agua para aprender sobre la hidrosfera. La 
sequía que es experimentada será explorada con gráficos y un plan 
personal para la conservación del agua.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:LINDA CUMMER
FN:LINDA CUMMER
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770204452</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104311</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/the-drought-causes-conservation</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
